name: Etemon
effect: [Your Turn] When this Digimon digivolves into a Digimon card with [Etemon] in its name in your hand, reduce the memory cost of the digivolution by 1.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has [Etemon] in its name, it gains ＜Jamming＞. (This Digimon can't be deleted in battles against Security Digimon.)
